text: The Woman Everyone Loves Is You (German: Die Frau, die jeder liebt, bist du) is a 1929 German silent film directed by Carl Froelich and starring Henny Porten, Fritz Kampers and Paul Hörbiger.Bock & Bergfelder p.215 The film's sets were designed by Gustav A. Knauer and Willy Schiller. ==Cast== * Henny Porten as Minny * Fritz Kampers as Rummelhart, ihr Bräutigam * Paul Hörbiger as Dörsterlein * Otto Wallburg as Haucke * Willi Forst as Picard * Jaro Fürth as Kolbe * Walter Tost as Max * Ida Krill as Frau Lehmann * Ilse Nast as Else * Toni Tetzlaff as Rosita Rosetta ==References== ==Bibliography== * Hans- Michael Bock and Tim Bergfelder. The Concise Cinegraph: An Encyclopedia of German Cinema. Berghahn Books, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:1929 comedy films Category:German comedy films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German silent feature films Category:Films directed by Carl Froelich Category:German black-and-white films Category:Universal Pictures films
title: The Woman Everyone Loves Is You
